Translations.Text: vehuve-llezi ensee lekumu-ssem`a vel'ebsara vel'ef'ideh. kalilem ma teskurun
vehuve-llezi yuhyi veyumitu velehu-htilafu-lleyli vennehar. efela ta`kilun
kalu eiza mitna vekunna turabev ve`izamen einna lemeb`usun
lekad vu`idna nahnu veabauna haza min kablu in haza illa esatiru-l'evvelin
kul limeni-l'ardu vemen fiha in kuntum ta`lemun
kul mem biyedihi melekutu kulli sey'iv vehuve yuciru vela yucaru `aleyhi in kuntum ta`lemun
me-ttehaze-llahu miv velediv vema kane me`ahu min ilahin izel lezehebe kullu ilahim bima haleka vele`ala ba`duhum `ala ba`d. subhane-llahi `amma yesifun
